visualization_prompt: Generate a lineargauge showing performance metrics against target thresholds using color-coded plot bands and directional target indicators
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains univariate performance metrics on a 0-100 scale. Synthetic thresholds (20/70) create three operational zones: Critical (red), Warning (yellow), and Optimal (green). The lineargauge's inverted layout maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating redundant gridlines while maintaining clear scale references through tick marks. Target indicators use pre-attentive processing with contrasting colors and directional shapes to highlight variance from ideal ranges. The single data point (82) shows 12% overshoot beyond the green zone threshold, with the target marker's length (150% of column width) and dark color providing strong visual anchoring. Proportional plot bands follow Cairo's perceptual principles by using equal luminance steps between zones.
